net.sitecore.android.sdk.web

Class ScWebViewFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • net.sitecore.android.sdk.web.ScWebViewFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ScWebViewFragment
extends android.app.Fragment
    Fragment that displays a WebView.

    The WebView is paused or resumed when the Fragment is paused or resumed.

    For versions prior Android 3.0 use ScWebViewSupportFragment.

    See Also:
    ScWebViewSupportFragment
